◆ available_upgrades()

std::vector< basecamp_upgrade > basecamp::available_upgrades ( const point &  dir)

Definition at line 322 of file basecamp.cpp.

323 {
324  std::vector<basecamp_upgrade> ret_data;
325  auto e = expansions.find( dir );
326  if( e != expansions.end() ) {
327  expansion_data &e_data = e->second;
328  for( const recipe *recp_p : recipe_dict.all_blueprints() ) {
329  const recipe &recp = *recp_p;
330  const std::string &bldg = recp.result().str();
331  // skip buildings that are completed
332  if( e_data.provides.find( bldg ) != e_data.provides.end() ) {
333  continue;
334  }
335  // skip building that have unmet requirements
336  size_t needed_requires = recp.blueprint_requires().size();
337  size_t met_requires = 0;
338  for( const auto &bp_require : recp.blueprint_requires() ) {
339  if( e_data.provides.find( bp_require.first ) == e_data.provides.end() ) {
340  break;
341  }
342  if( e_data.provides[bp_require.first] < bp_require.second ) {
343  break;
344  }
345  met_requires += 1;
346  }
347  if( met_requires < needed_requires ) {
348  continue;
349  }
350  bool should_display = true;
351  bool in_progress = false;
352  for( const auto &bp_exclude : recp.blueprint_excludes() ) {
353  // skip buildings that are excluded by previous builds
354  if( e_data.provides.find( bp_exclude.first ) != e_data.provides.end() ) {
355  if( e_data.provides[bp_exclude.first] >= bp_exclude.second ) {
356  should_display = false;
357  break;
358  }
359  }
360  // track buildings that are currently being built
361  if( e_data.in_progress.find( bp_exclude.first ) != e_data.in_progress.end() ) {
362  if( e_data.in_progress[bp_exclude.first] >= bp_exclude.second ) {
363  in_progress = true;
364  break;
365  }
366  }
367  }
368  if( !should_display ) {
369  continue;
370  }
371  if( recp.blueprint_build_reqs().reqs_by_parameters.empty() ) {
372  debugmsg( "blueprint recipe %s lacked any blueprint_build_reqs", recp.result().str() );
373  }
374  for( const std::pair<const mapgen_arguments, build_reqs> &args_and_reqs :
375  recp.blueprint_build_reqs().reqs_by_parameters ) {
376  const mapgen_arguments &args = args_and_reqs.first;
377  const requirement_data &reqs = args_and_reqs.second.consolidated_reqs;
378  bool can_make =
379  reqs.can_make_with_inventory( _inv, recp.get_component_filter(), 1 );
380  ret_data.push_back( { bldg, args, recp.blueprint_name(), can_make, in_progress } );
381  }
382  }
383  }
384  return ret_data;
385 }

◆ camp_food_supply() [2/3]

nutrients basecamp::camp_food_supply ( nutrients &  change)

Changes the faction food supply by change, returns the amount of kcal+vitamins consumed, a negative total food supply hurts morale Handles vitamin consumption when only a kcal value is supplied.

Definition at line 5522 of file faction_camp.cpp.

5523 {
5524  nutrients consumed;
5525  if( change.calories < 0 && change.vitamins().empty() && fac()->food_supply.calories > 0 ) {
5526  // We've been passed a raw kcal value, we should also consume a proportional amount of vitamins
5527  // Kcals are used as a proxy to consume vitamins.
5528  // e.g. if you have a larder with 10k kcal, 100 vitamin A, 200 vitamin B then consuming 1000 kcal will
5529  // consume 10 vitamin A and *20* vitamin B. In other words, we assume the vitamins are uniformly distributed with the kcals
5530  // This isn't a perfect assumption but it's a necessary one to abstract away the food items themselves
5531  double percent_consumed = std::abs( static_cast<double>( change.calories ) ) /
5532  fac()->food_supply.calories;
5533  consumed = fac()->food_supply;
5534  if( std::abs( change.calories ) > fac()->food_supply.calories ) {
5535  //Whoops, we don't have enough food. Empty the larder! No crumb shall go un-eaten!
5536  fac()->food_supply += change;
5537  faction *yours = get_player_character().get_faction();
5538  if( fac()->id == yours->id ) {
5539  yours->likes_u += fac()->food_supply.kcal() / 1250;
5540  yours->respects_u += fac()->food_supply.kcal() / 625;
5541  yours->trusts_u += fac()->food_supply.kcal() / 625;
5542  }
5543  fac()->food_supply *= 0;
5544  return consumed;
5545  }
5546  consumed *= percent_consumed;
5547  // Subtraction since we use the absolute value of change's calories to get the percent
5548  fac()->food_supply -= consumed;
5549  return consumed;
5550  }
5551  fac()->food_supply += change;
5552  consumed = change;
5553  return consumed;
5554 }

◆ choose_new_leader()

void basecamp::choose_new_leader ( )

Definition at line 1601 of file faction_camp.cpp.

1602 {
1603  // This is ugly, but dialogue vars are stored as strings, even if they hold data for times.
1604  time_point last_succession_time = time_point::from_turn( std::stof(
1605  get_player_character().get_value( var_timer_time_of_last_succession ) ) );
1606  time_duration succession_cooldown = time_duration::from_turns( std::stof(
1607  get_globals().get_global_value(
1608  var_time_between_succession ) ) );
1609  time_point next_succession_chance = last_succession_time + succession_cooldown;
1610  int current_time_int = to_seconds<int>( calendar::turn - calendar::turn_zero );
1611  if( next_succession_chance >= calendar::turn ) {
1612  popup( _( "It's too early for that. A new leader can be chosen in %s." ),
1613  to_string( next_succession_chance - calendar::turn ) );
1614  return;
1615  }
1616  std::vector<std::string> choices;
1617  int choice = 0;
1618  choices.emplace_back _( "autocratic" );
1619  choices.emplace_back _( "sortition" );
1620  choices.emplace_back _( "democratic" );
1621 
1622  choice = uilist( _( "Choose how the new leader will be determined." ), choices );
1623 
1624  if( choice < 0 || static_cast<size_t>( choice ) >= choices.size() ) {
1625  popup( _( "You choose to wait…" ) );
1626  return;
1627  }
1628 
1629  // Autocratic
1630  if( choice == 0 ) {
1631  if( !query_yn(
1632  _( "As an experienced leader, only you know what will be required of future leaders. You will choose.\n\nIs this acceptable?" ) ) ) {
1633  return;
1634  }
1635  get_avatar().control_npc_menu( false );
1636  // Possible to exit menu and not choose a *new* leader. However this doesn't reset global timer. 100% on purpose, since you are "choosing" yourself.
1637  get_player_character().set_value( var_timer_time_of_last_succession,
1638  std::to_string( current_time_int ) );
1639  }
1640 
1641  // Vector of pairs containing a pointer to an NPC and their modified social score
1642  std::vector<std::pair<shared_ptr_fast<npc>, int>> followers;
1643  // You is still a nullptr! We never want to actually call the first value, this will crash.
1644  shared_ptr_fast<npc> you;
1645  followers.emplace_back( you, rng( 0, 5 ) +
1646  rng( 0, get_avatar().get_skill_level( skill_speech ) * 2 ) );
1647  int charnum = 0;
1648  for( const character_id &elem : g->get_follower_list() ) {
1649  shared_ptr_fast<npc> follower = overmap_buffer.find_npc( elem );
1650  if( follower ) {
1651  // Yes this is a very barren representation of who gets elected in a democracy. Too bad!
1652  int popularity = rng( 0, 5 ) + rng( 0, follower->get_skill_level( skill_speech ) * 2 );
1653  followers.emplace_back( follower, popularity );
1654  charnum++;
1655  }
1656  }
1657  // Sortition
1658  if( choice == 1 ) {
1659  if( !query_yn(
1660  _( "You will allow fate to choose the next leader. Whether it's by dice, drawing straws, or picking names out of a hat, it will be purely random.\n\nIs this acceptable?" ) ) ) {
1661  return;
1662  }
1663  int selected = rng( 0, charnum );
1664  // Vector starts at 0, we inserted 'you' first, 0 will always be 'you' pre-sort (that's why we don't sort unless democracy is called)
1665  if( selected == 0 ) {
1666  popup( _( "Fate calls for you to remain in your role as leader… for now." ) );
1667  get_player_character().set_value( var_timer_time_of_last_succession,
1668  std::to_string( current_time_int ) );
1669  return;
1670  }
1671  npc_ptr chosen = followers.at( selected ).first;
1672  popup( _( "Fate chooses %s to lead your faction." ), chosen->get_name() );
1673  get_avatar().control_npc( *chosen, false );
1674  return;
1675  }
1676 
1677  // Democratic
1678  if( choice == 2 ) {
1679  if( !query_yn(
1680  _( "A leader can only lead those willing to follow. Everyone must get a say in choosing the new leader.\n\nIs this acceptable?" ) ) ) {
1681  return;
1682  }
1683  std::sort( followers.begin(), followers.end(), []( const auto & x, const auto & y ) {
1684  return x.second > y.second;
1685  } );
1686  npc_ptr elected = followers.at( 0 ).first;
1687  // you == nullptr
1688  if( elected == nullptr ) {
1689  popup( _( "You win the election!" ) );
1690  get_player_character().set_value( var_timer_time_of_last_succession,
1691  std::to_string( current_time_int ) );
1692  return;
1693  }
1694  popup( _( "%1$s wins the election with a popularity of %2$s! The runner-up had a popularity of %3$s." ),
1695  elected->get_name(), followers.at( 0 ).second, followers.at( 1 ).second );
1696  get_avatar().control_npc( *elected, false );
1697  }
1698 }

4386 {

4400  popup( _( "Your companion hit a river and didn't know how to swim…" ) );

4403  "enough to cross…" ) );
4404  }

4409  comp->death_drops = true;
4410  if( outcome ) {

4413  popup( _( "%s didn't return from patrol…" ), comp->get_name() );

4416  overmap_buffer.remove_npc( comp->getID() );
4417  return;

4396  expansion_data e;
4397  point dir;
4398  if( edata.has_string( "dir" ) ) {
4399  // old save compatibility
4400  const std::string dir_id = edata.get_string( "dir" );
4401  dir = base_camps::direction_from_id( dir_id );
4402  } else {
4403  edata.read( "dir", dir );
4404  }
4405  edata.read( "type", e.type );
4406  if( edata.has_int( "cur_level" ) ) {
4407  edata.read( "cur_level", e.cur_level );
4408  }
4409  if( edata.has_array( "provides" ) ) {
4410  e.cur_level = -1;
4411  for( JsonObject provide_data : edata.get_array( "provides" ) ) {
4412  provide_data.allow_omitted_members();
4413  std::string id = provide_data.get_string( "id" );
4414  int amount = provide_data.get_int( "amount" );
4415  e.provides[ id ] = amount;
4416  }
4417  }
4418  // in case of save corruption, sanity check provides from expansions
4419  const std::string &initial_provide = base_camps::faction_encode_abs( e, 0 );
4420  if( e.provides.find( initial_provide ) == e.provides.end() ) {
4421  e.provides[ initial_provide ] = 1;
4422  }
4423  for( JsonObject in_progress_data : edata.get_array( "in_progress" ) ) {
4424  in_progress_data.allow_omitted_members();
4425  std::string id = in_progress_data.get_string( "id" );
4426  int amount = in_progress_data.get_int( "amount" );
4427  e.in_progress[ id ] = amount;
4428  }
4429  edata.read( "pos", e.pos );
4430  expansions[ dir ] = e;
4431  if( dir != base_camps::base_dir ) {
4432  directions.push_back( dir );
4433  }
4434  }
4435  for( JsonObject edata : data.get_array( "fortifications" ) ) {
4436  edata.allow_omitted_members();
4437  tripoint_abs_omt restore_pos;
4438  edata.read( "pos", restore_pos );
4439  fortifications.push_back( restore_pos );
4440  }
4441 
4442  for( JsonObject edata : data.get_array( "salt_water_pipes" ) ) {
4443  edata.allow_omitted_members();
4444  expansion_salt_water_pipe *pipe = new expansion_salt_water_pipe;
4445  edata.read( "expansion", pipe->expansion );
4446  edata.read( "connection_direction", pipe->connection_direction );
4447  for( JsonObject seg : edata.get_array( "segments" ) ) {
4448  seg.allow_omitted_members();
4449  expansion_salt_water_pipe_segment segment;
4450  seg.read( "point", segment.point );
4451  seg.read( "started", segment.started );
4452  seg.read( "finished", segment.finished );
4453  pipe->segments.push_back( segment );
4454  }
4455  salt_water_pipes.push_back( pipe );
4456  }
4457 }

◆ distribute_food()

bool basecamp::distribute_food ( )

Takes all the food from the camp_food zone and increases the faction food_supply.

Definition at line 5676 of file faction_camp.cpp.

5677 {
5678  if( !validate_sort_points() ) {
5679  popup( _( "You do not have a camp food zone. Aborting…" ) );
5680  return false;
5681  }
5682 
5683  map &here = get_map();
5684  zone_manager &mgr = zone_manager::get_manager();
5685  if( here.check_vehicle_zones( here.get_abs_sub().z() ) ) {
5686  mgr.cache_vzones();
5687  }
5688  const tripoint_abs_ms &abspos = get_dumping_spot();
5689  const std::unordered_set<tripoint_abs_ms> &z_food =
5690  mgr.get_near( zone_type_CAMP_FOOD, abspos, 60 );
5691 
5692  double quick_rot = 0.6 + ( has_provides( "pantry" ) ? 0.1 : 0 );
5693  double slow_rot = 0.8 + ( has_provides( "pantry" ) ? 0.05 : 0 );
5694  nutrients nutrients_to_add;
5695 
5696  const auto rot_multip = [&]( const item & it, item * const container ) {
5697  if( !it.goes_bad() ) {
5698  return 1.;
5699  }
5700  float spoil_mod = 1.0f;
5701  if( container ) {
5702  if( item_pocket *const pocket = container->contained_where( it ) ) {
5703  spoil_mod = pocket->spoil_multiplier();
5704  }
5705  }
5706  // Container seals and prevents any spoilage.
5707  if( spoil_mod == 0 ) {
5708  return 1.;
5709  }
5710  // @TODO: this does not handle fridges or things like root cellar, but maybe it shouldn't.
5711  const time_duration rots_in = ( it.get_shelf_life() - it.get_rot() ) / spoil_mod;
5712  if( rots_in >= 5_days ) {
5713  return 1.;
5714  } else if( rots_in >= 2_days ) {
5715  return slow_rot;
5716  } else {
5717  return quick_rot;
5718  }
5719  };
5720  const auto consume_non_recursive = [&]( item & it, item * const container ) {
5721  if( !it.is_comestible() ) {
5722  return false;
5723  }
5724  // Always reject in-progress craft item
5725  if( it.is_craft() ) {
5726  return false;
5727  }
5728  // Stuff like butchery refuse and other disgusting stuff
5729  if( it.get_comestible_fun() < -6 ) {
5730  return false;
5731  }
5732  if( it.has_flag( flag_INEDIBLE ) ) {
5733  return false;
5734  }
5735  if( it.rotten() ) {
5736  return false;
5737  }
5738  nutrients from_it = getAverageJoe().compute_effective_nutrients( it ) * it.count();
5739  // Do this multiplication separately to make sure we're using the *= operator with double argument..
5740  from_it *= rot_multip( it, container );
5741  nutrients_to_add += from_it;
5742  if( from_it.kcal() <= 0 ) {
5743  // can happen if calories is low and rot is high.
5744  return false;
5745  }
5746  return true;
5747  };
5748 
5749  // Returns whether the item should be removed from the map.
5750  const auto consume = [&]( item & it, item * const container ) {
5751  if( it.is_food_container() ) {
5752  std::vector<item *> to_remove;
5753  it.visit_items( [&]( item * content, item * parent ) {
5754  if( consume_non_recursive( *content, parent ) ) {
5755  to_remove.push_back( content );
5756  return VisitResponse::SKIP;
5757  }
5758  return VisitResponse::NEXT;
5759  } );
5760  if( to_remove.empty() ) {
5761  return false;
5762  }
5763  for( item *const food : to_remove ) {
5764  it.remove_item( *food );
5765  }
5766  it.on_contents_changed();
5767  return false;
5768  }
5769  return consume_non_recursive( it, container );
5770  };
5771  for( const tripoint_abs_ms &p_food_stock_abs : z_food ) {
5772  // @FIXME: this will not handle zones in vehicle
5773  const tripoint p_food_stock = here.getlocal( p_food_stock_abs );
5774  map_stack items = here.i_at( p_food_stock );
5775  for( auto iter = items.begin(); iter != items.end(); ) {
5776  if( consume( *iter, nullptr ) ) {
5777  iter = items.erase( iter );
5778  } else {
5779  ++iter;
5780  }
5781  }
5782  }
5783 
5784  if( nutrients_to_add.kcal() <= 0 ) {
5785  popup( _( "No suitable items are located at the drop points…" ) );
5786  return false;
5787  }
5788 
5789  popup( _( "You distribute %d kcal worth of food to your companions." ), nutrients_to_add.kcal() );
5790  camp_food_supply( nutrients_to_add );
5791  return true;
5792 }

◆ emergency_recall()

npc_ptr basecamp::emergency_recall ( const mission_id &  miss_id)

select a companion for any mission to return to base

Definition at line 3840 of file faction_camp.cpp.

3841 {
3842  npc_ptr comp = talk_function::companion_choose_return( omt_pos, base_camps::id, miss_id,
3843  calendar::turn - 24_hours, false );
3844  if( comp != nullptr ) {
3845 
3846  // Special handing for camp upgrades. If multiple companions are assigned, the remaining time
3847  // is divided between the remaining workers. Note that this logic relies on there being only
3848  // a single instance of each construction active, and thus all workers assigned to that
3849  // blueprint are on the same mission. Won't work with e.g. crafting, as different instances of
3850  // the same crafting mission may be in various stages of completion concurrently.
3851  if( comp->get_companion_mission().miss_id.id == Camp_Upgrade ) {
3852  comp_list npc_list = get_mission_workers( comp->get_companion_mission().miss_id );
3853 
3854  if( npc_list.size() > 1 ) {
3855  time_duration remaining_time = comp->companion_mission_time_ret - calendar::turn;
3856  if( remaining_time > time_duration::from_turns( 0 ) ) {
3857  remaining_time = remaining_time * npc_list.size() / ( npc_list.size() - 1 );
3858  }
3859 
3860  for( npc_ptr &worker : npc_list ) {
3861  if( worker != comp ) {
3862  worker->companion_mission_time_ret = calendar::turn + remaining_time;
3863  }
3864  }
3865  }
3866  }
3867 
3868  const std::string return_msg = _( "responds to the emergency recall…" );
3869  finish_return( *comp, false, return_msg, skill_menial.str(), 0, true );
3870  }
3871  return comp;
3872 
3873 }

5498  switch( operation ) {

◆ feed_workers() [2/2]

void basecamp::feed_workers ( const std::vector< std::reference_wrapper< Character >> &  workers,
nutrients  food,
bool  is_player_meal = false 
)

Evenly distributes the actual consumed food from a work project to the workers assigned to it.

Definition at line 5569 of file faction_camp.cpp.

5571 {
5572  const int num_workers = workers.size();
5573  if( num_workers == 0 ) {
5574  debugmsg( "feed_workers called without any workers to feed!" );
5575  return;
5576  }
5577  if( !is_player_meal && get_option<bool>( "NO_NPC_FOOD" ) ) {
5578  return;
5579  }
5580 
5581  // Split the food into equal sized portions.
5582  food /= num_workers;
5583  for( const auto &worker_reference : workers ) {
5584  Character &worker = worker_reference.get();
5585  item food_item = make_fake_food( food );
5586  // Handle allergies and other stuff
5587  bool query_player = !worker.is_npc();
5588  const ret_val<edible_rating> rating = worker.will_eat( food_item, query_player );
5589  switch( rating.value() ) {
5590  case EDIBLE:
5591  // I'd like to use consume_activity_actor here, but our little trick with make_fake_food() requires that the
5592  // item be consumed immediately.
5593  worker.consume( food_item );
5594  break;
5595  case TOO_FULL:
5596  worker.add_msg_player_or_npc( m_neutral,
5597  _( "You are too full to eat right now, and put the meal back into storage." ),
5598  _( "<npcname> is too full to eat right now, and puts the meal back into storage." ) );
5599  camp_food_supply( food );
5600  break;
5601  case INEDIBLE:
5602  case INEDIBLE_MUTATION:
5603  debugmsg( "Always-edible food somehow inedible, please report this error." );
5604  camp_food_supply( food );
5605  break;
5606  case ALLERGY:
5607  worker.add_msg_if_npc( m_bad,
5608  _( "%s takes one look at the food and declines, explaining they're allergic." ),
5609  worker.get_name() );
5610  camp_food_supply( food );
5611  break;
5612  case ALLERGY_WEAK:
5613  worker.add_msg_if_npc( m_bad,
5614  _( "%s takes a bite but spits it out. It seems something in the food disagrees with them." ),
5615  worker.get_name() );
5616  camp_food_supply( food );
5617  break;
5618  case CANNIBALISM:
5619  worker.add_msg_if_npc( m_bad,
5620  _( "%s thanks you for the meal, but when they see what's in the meal their attitude suddenly changes!" ),
5621  worker.get_name() );
5622  if( worker.is_npc() ) {
5623  worker.as_npc()->mutiny();
5624  }
5625  // Food specifically does not go back in the larder.
5626  break;
5627  case PARASITES:
5628  // None of these should ever happen.
5629  case ROTTEN:
5630  case NAUSEA:
5631  case NO_TOOL:
5632  break;
5633  }
5634  }
5635 }

◆ form_crafting_inventory() [2/2]

void basecamp::form_crafting_inventory ( map &  target_map)

Definition at line 708 of file basecamp.cpp.

709 {
710  _inv.clear();
711  zone_manager &mgr = zone_manager::get_manager();
712  map &here = get_map();
713  if( here.check_vehicle_zones( here.get_abs_sub().z() ) ) {
714  mgr.cache_vzones();
715  }
716  if( !src_set.empty() ) {
717  _inv.form_from_zone( target_map, src_set, nullptr, false );
718  }
719  /*
720  * something of a hack: add the resources we know the camp has
721  * the hacky part is that we're adding resources based on the camp's flags, which were
722  * generated based on upgrade missions, instead of having resources added when the
723  * map changes
724  */
725  // make sure the array is empty
726  fuels.clear();
727  for( const itype_id &fuel_id : fuel_types ) {
728  basecamp_fuel bcp_f;
729  bcp_f.ammo_id = fuel_id;
730  fuels.emplace_back( bcp_f );
731  }
732 
733  // find available fuel
734 
735  for( const tripoint_abs_ms &abs_ms_pt : src_set ) {
736  const tripoint &pt = target_map.getlocal( abs_ms_pt );
737  if( target_map.accessible_items( pt ) ) {
738  for( const item &i : target_map.i_at( pt ) ) {
739  for( basecamp_fuel &bcp_f : fuels ) {
740  if( bcp_f.ammo_id == i.typeId() ) {
741  bcp_f.available += i.charges;
742  break;
743  }
744  }
745  }
746  }
747 
748  }
749  for( basecamp_resource &bcp_r : resources ) {
750  bcp_r.consumed = 0;
751  item camp_item( bcp_r.fake_id, calendar::turn_zero );
752  camp_item.set_flag( STATIC( flag_id( "PSEUDO" ) ) );
753  if( !bcp_r.ammo_id.is_null() ) {
754  for( basecamp_fuel &bcp_f : fuels ) {
755  if( bcp_f.ammo_id == bcp_r.ammo_id ) {
756  if( bcp_f.available > 0 ) {
757  bcp_r.available = bcp_f.available;
758  camp_item = camp_item.ammo_set( bcp_f.ammo_id, bcp_f.available );
759  }
760  break;
761  }
762  }
763  }
764  _inv.add_item( camp_item );
765  }
766 
767  // We're potentially adding the same item multiple times if present in multiple expansions,
768  // but we're already that with the resources above. The resources are stored in expansions
769  // rather than in a common pool to allow them to apply only to their respective expansion
770  // in the future.
771  for( auto &expansion : expansions ) {
772  for( itype_id &it : expansion.second.available_pseudo_items ) {
773  item camp_item = item( it );
774  if( camp_item.is_magazine() ) {
775  for( basecamp_fuel &bcp_f : fuels ) {
776  if( camp_item.can_reload_with( item( bcp_f.ammo_id ), false ) ) {
777  if( bcp_f.available > 0 ) {
778  camp_item = camp_item.ammo_set( bcp_f.ammo_id, bcp_f.available );
779  }
780  break;
781  }
782  }
783  }
784 
785  _inv.add_item( camp_item );
786  }
787  }
788 }

4014  break;

4027  }

4034 
4035  return true;
4036 }

796  // return legacy workers. How old is this legacy?...
797  mission_id miss_id = { Camp_Upgrade, "", {}, dir };
798  comp_list npc_list = get_mission_workers( miss_id ); // Don't match any blueprints
799 
800  if( !npc_list.empty() ) {
801  entry = action_of( miss_id.id );
802  bool avail = update_time_left( entry, npc_list );
803  mission_key.add_return( miss_id, base_camps::recover_ally_string.translated()
804  + dir_abbr + base_camps::expansion_string.translated(),
805  entry, avail );
806  }
807  // Generate upgrade missions for expansions
808  std::vector<basecamp_upgrade> upgrades = available_upgrades( dir );
809 
810  std::sort( upgrades.begin(), upgrades.end(), []( const basecamp_upgrade & p,
811  const basecamp_upgrade & q )->bool {return p.name.translated_lt( q.name ); } );
812 
813  for( const basecamp_upgrade &upgrade : upgrades ) {
814  miss_id.parameters = upgrade.bldg;
815  miss_id.mapgen_args = upgrade.args;
816 
817  comp_list npc_list = get_mission_workers( miss_id );
818 
819  if( npc_list.empty() ) {
820  std::string display_name = name_display_of( miss_id );
821  const recipe &making = *recipe_id( miss_id.parameters );
822  const int foodcost = time_to_food( base_camps::to_workdays( time_duration::from_moves(
823  making.blueprint_build_reqs().reqs_by_parameters.find( miss_id.mapgen_args )->second.time ) ),
824  making.exertion_level() );
825  const int available_calories = fac()->food_supply.kcal();
826  bool can_upgrade = upgrade.avail;
827  entry = om_upgrade_description( upgrade.bldg, upgrade.args );
828  if( foodcost > available_calories ) {
829  can_upgrade = false;
830  entry += string_format( _( "Total calorie cost: %s (have %d)" ),
831  colorize( std::to_string( foodcost ), c_red ),
832  available_calories );
833  } else {
834  entry += string_format( _( "Total calorie cost: %s (have %d)" ),
835  colorize( std::to_string( foodcost ), c_green ),
836  available_calories );
837  }
838  mission_key.add_start( miss_id, display_name, entry, can_upgrade );
839  } else {
840  entry = action_of( miss_id.id );
841  bool avail = update_time_left( entry, npc_list );
842  mission_key.add_return( miss_id,
843  base_camps::recover_ally_string.translated() + dir_abbr +
844  " " + upgrade.name, entry, avail );
845  }
846  }
847  }
848 
849  if( has_provides( "gathering", dir ) ) {
850  const mission_id miss_id = { Camp_Gather_Materials, "", {}, dir };
851  std::string gather_bldg = "null";
852  comp_list npc_list = get_mission_workers( miss_id );
853  entry = string_format( _( "Notes:\n"
854  "Send a companion to gather materials for the next camp "
855  "upgrade.\n\n"
856  "Skill used: survival\n"
857  "Difficulty: N/A\n"
858  "Gathering Possibilities:\n"
859  "%s\n"
860  "Risk: Very Low\n"
861  "Intensity: Light\n"
862  "Time: 3 Hours, Repeated\n"
863  "Positions: %d/3\n" ), gathering_description(),
864  npc_list.size() );
865  mission_key.add_start( miss_id, name_display_of( miss_id ),
866  entry, npc_list.size() < 3 );
867  if( !npc_list.empty() ) {
868  entry = action_of( miss_id.id );
869  bool avail = update_time_fixed( entry, npc_list, 3_hours );
870  mission_key.add_return( miss_id, dir_abbr + _( " Recover Ally from Gathering" ),
871  entry, avail );
872  }
873  }
874  if( has_provides( "firewood", dir ) ) {
875  const mission_id miss_id = { Camp_Collect_Firewood, "", {}, dir };
876  comp_list npc_list = get_mission_workers( miss_id );
877  entry = string_format( _( "Notes:\n"
878  "Send a companion to gather light brush and stout branches.\n\n"
879  "Skill used: survival\n"
880  "Difficulty: N/A\n"
881  "Gathering Possibilities:\n"
882  "> stout branches\n"
883  "> withered plants\n"
884  "> splintered wood\n\n"
885  "Risk: Very Low\n"
886  "Intensity: Light\n"
887  "Time: 3 Hours, Repeated\n"
888  "Positions: %d/3\n" ), npc_list.size() );
889  mission_key.add_start( miss_id, name_display_of( miss_id ),
890  entry, npc_list.size() < 3 );
891  if( !npc_list.empty() ) {
892  entry = action_of( miss_id.id );
893  bool avail = update_time_fixed( entry, npc_list, 3_hours );
894  mission_key.add_return( miss_id, dir_abbr + _( " Recover Firewood Gatherers" ),
895  entry, avail );
896  }
897  }

899  const mission_id miss_id = { Camp_Menial, "", {}, dir };
900  comp_list npc_list = get_mission_workers( miss_id );
901  entry = string_format( _( "Notes:\n"
902  "Send a companion to do low level chores and sort "
903  "supplies.\n\n"
904  "Skill used: fabrication\n"
905  "Difficulty: N/A\n"
906  "Effects:\n"
907  "> Material left in the unsorted loot zone will be sorted "
908  "into a defined loot zone."
909  "\n\nRisk: None\n"
910  "Time: 3 Hours\n"
911  "Positions: %d/1\n" ), npc_list.size() );
912  mission_key.add_start( miss_id, name_display_of( miss_id ),
913  entry, npc_list.empty() );
914  if( !npc_list.empty() ) {
915  entry = action_of( miss_id.id );
916  bool avail = update_time_left( entry, npc_list );
917  mission_key.add_return( miss_id, dir_abbr + _( " Recover Menial Laborer" ),
918  entry, avail );
919  }
920  }

924  comp_list npc_list = get_mission_workers( miss_id );
925  entry = string_format( _( "Notes:\n"
926  "Send a companion to a nearby forest to cut logs.\n\n"
927  "Skill used: fabrication\n"
928  "Difficulty: 2\n"
929  "Effects:\n"
930  "> 50%% of trees/trunks at the forest position will be "
931  "cut down.\n"
932  "> 100%% of total material will be brought back.\n"
933  "> Repeatable with diminishing returns.\n"
934  "> Will eventually turn forests into fields.\n"
935  "Risk: None\n"
936  "Intensity: Active\n"
937  "Time: 6 Hour Base + Travel Time + Cutting Time\n"
938  "Positions: %d/1\n" ), npc_list.size() );
939  mission_key.add_start( miss_id, name_display_of( miss_id ),
940  entry, npc_list.empty() );
941  if( !npc_list.empty() ) {
942  entry = action_of( miss_id.id );
943  bool avail = update_time_left( entry, npc_list );
944  mission_key.add_return( miss_id, dir_abbr + _( " Recover Log Cutter" ),
945  entry, avail );
946  }
947  }

1100  }
1101 
1102  if( has_provides( "walls", dir ) ) {
1103  mission_id miss_id = {
1104  Camp_OM_Fortifications, camp_om_fortifications_trench_parameter, {}, dir
1105  };
1106  comp_list npc_list = get_mission_workers( miss_id );
1107  entry = om_upgrade_description( faction_wall_level_n_0_string, {} );
1108  // Should add check for materials as well as active mission.
1109  mission_key.add_start( miss_id, name_display_of( miss_id ),
1110  entry, npc_list.empty() );
1111  if( !npc_list.empty() ) {
1112  entry = action_of( miss_id.id );
1113  bool avail = update_time_left( entry, npc_list );
1114  mission_key.add_return( miss_id, dir_abbr + _( " Finish Map Fortifications" ),
1115  entry, avail );
1116  }
1117 
1118  entry = om_upgrade_description( faction_wall_level_n_1_string, {} );
1119  miss_id.parameters = camp_om_fortifications_spiked_trench_parameter;
1120  npc_list = get_mission_workers( miss_id );
1121  // Should add check for materials as well as active mission.
1122  // Should also check if there are any trenches to improve.
1123  mission_key.add_start( miss_id, name_display_of( miss_id ),
1124  entry,
1125  npc_list.empty() );
1126  if( !npc_list.empty() ) {
1127  entry = action_of( miss_id.id );
1128  bool avail = update_time_left( entry, npc_list );
1129  mission_key.add_return( miss_id, dir_abbr + _( " Finish Map Fortification Update" ),
1130  entry, avail );
1131  }
1132 
1133  // Code to deal with legacy construction (Changed during 0.F)
1134  miss_id.parameters.clear();
1135  npc_list = get_mission_workers( miss_id );
1136 
1137  if( !npc_list.empty() ) {
1138  entry = action_of( miss_id.id );
1139  bool avail = update_time_left( entry, npc_list );
1140  mission_key.add_return( miss_id, dir_abbr + _( " Finish Map Fortifications" ),
1141  entry, avail );
1142  }
1143 
1144  }
1145 
1146  if( has_provides( "recruiting", dir ) ) {
1147  const mission_id miss_id = { Camp_Recruiting, "", {}, dir };
1148  comp_list npc_list = get_mission_workers( miss_id );

1150  mission_key.add_start( miss_id, name_display_of( miss_id ), entry,
1151  npc_list.empty() );
1152  if( !npc_list.empty() ) {
1153  entry = action_of( miss_id.id );

1159 
1160  if( has_provides( "scouting", dir ) ) {
1161  const mission_id miss_id = { Camp_Scouting, "", {}, dir };
1162  comp_list npc_list = get_mission_workers( miss_id );
1163  entry = string_format( _( "Notes:\n"
1164  "Send a companion out into the great unknown. High survival "
1165  "skills are needed to avoid combat but you should expect an "
1166  "encounter or two.\n\n"
1167  "Skill used: survival\n"
1168  "Difficulty: 3\n"
1169  "Effects:\n"
1170  "> Select checkpoints to customize path.\n"
1171  "> Reveals terrain around the path.\n"
1172  "> Can bounce off hide sites to extend range.\n\n"
1173  "Risk: High\n"
1174  "Intensity: Brisk\n"
1175  "Time: Travel\n"
1176  "Positions: %d/3\n" ), npc_list.size() );
1177  mission_key.add_start( miss_id, name_display_of( miss_id ),
1178  entry, npc_list.size() < 3 );
1179  if( !npc_list.empty() ) {
1180  entry = action_of( miss_id.id );
1181  bool avail = update_time_left( entry, npc_list );
1182  mission_key.add_return( miss_id, dir_abbr + _( " Recover Scout" ),
1183  entry, avail );
1184  }
1185  }
1186 
1187  if( has_provides( "patrolling", dir ) ) {
1188  const mission_id miss_id = { Camp_Combat_Patrol, "", {}, dir };
1189  comp_list npc_list = get_mission_workers( miss_id );
1190  entry = string_format( _( "Notes:\n"
1191  "Send a companion to purge the wasteland. Their goal is to "
1192  "kill anything hostile they encounter and return when "
1193  "their wounds are too great or the odds are stacked against "
1194  "them.\n\n"
1195  "Skill used: survival\n"
1196  "Difficulty: 4\n"
1197  "Effects:\n"
1198  "> Pulls creatures encountered into combat instead of "
1199  "fleeing.\n"
1200  "> Select checkpoints to customize path.\n"
1201  "> Can bounce off hide sites to extend range.\n\n"
1202  "Risk: Very High\n"
1203  "Intensity: Brisk\n"
1204  "Time: Travel\n"
1205  "Positions: %d/3\n" ), npc_list.size() );
1206  mission_key.add_start( miss_id, name_display_of( miss_id ),
1207  entry, npc_list.size() < 3 );
1208  if( !npc_list.empty() ) {
1209  entry = action_of( miss_id.id );
1210  bool avail = update_time_left( entry, npc_list );
1211  mission_key.add_return( miss_id, dir_abbr + _( " Recover Combat Patrol" ),
1212  entry, avail );
1213  }
1214  }
1215 
1216  if( has_provides( "dismantling",
1217  dir ) ) { // Obsolete (during 0.E), but we still have to be able to process existing missions.
1218  const mission_id miss_id = { Camp_Chop_Shop, "", {}, dir };
1219  comp_list npc_list = get_mission_workers( miss_id );
1220  if( !npc_list.empty() ) {
1221  entry = action_of( miss_id.id );
1222  bool avail = update_time_left( entry, npc_list );
1223  mission_key.add_return( miss_id,
1224  dir_abbr + _( " (Finish) Chop Shop" ), entry, avail );
1225  }
1226  }
1227  std::map<recipe_id, translation> craft_recipes = recipe_deck( dir );
1228  {
1229  mission_id miss_id = { Camp_Crafting, "", {}, dir };
1230  comp_list npc_list = get_mission_workers( miss_id, true );
1231  if( npc_list.size() < 3 ) {
1232  add_available_recipes( mission_key, Camp_Crafting, dir, craft_recipes );
1233  }
1234 
1235  if( !npc_list.empty() ) {
1236  std::map<std::string, comp_list> lists = companion_per_recipe_building_type( npc_list );
1237 
1238  for( std::pair<std::string, comp_list> npcs : lists ) {
1239  const std::string bldg = npcs.first;
1240  miss_id.parameters = npcs.second.at( 0 )->get_companion_mission().miss_id.parameters;
1241  bool avail = false;
1242  entry.clear();
1243 
1244  // Room for moving the match of recipe group 'building_type' to return string into JSON
1245  std::string return_craft;
1246 
1247  if( bldg == base_recipe_group_string ) {
1248  return_craft = _( " (Finish) Crafting" );
1249 
1250  } else if( bldg == cook_recipe_group_string ) {
1251  return_craft = _( " (Finish) Cooking" );
1252 
1253  } else if( bldg == farm_recipe_group_string ) {
1254  return_craft = _( " (Finish) Crafting" );
1255 
1256  } else if( bldg == smith_recipe_group_string ) {
1257  return_craft = _( " (Finish) Smithing" );
1258  }
1259 
1260  else { // No matching recipe group
1261  return_craft = _( " (Finish) Crafting" );
1262  }
1263 
1264  for( npc_ptr &comp : npcs.second ) {
1265  const bool done = comp->companion_mission_time_ret < calendar::turn;
1266  avail |= done;
1267  entry += comp->get_name() + " ";
1268  if( done ) {
1269  entry += _( "[DONE]\n" );
1270  } else {
1271  entry += " [" +
1272  to_string( comp->companion_mission_time_ret - calendar::turn ) +
1273  _( " left] " ) + action_of( miss_id.id );
1274  }
1275  }
1276 
1277  mission_key.add_return( miss_id,
1278  dir_abbr + return_craft, entry, avail );
1279  }
1280  }
1281 
1282  if( !mission_key.entries[size_t( base_camps::all_directions.at( dir ).tab_order ) + 1].empty() ||
1283  ( !hidden_missions.empty() &&
1284  !hidden_missions[size_t( base_camps::all_directions.at( dir ).tab_order )].empty() ) ) {
1285  {
1286  const mission_id miss_id = { Camp_Hide_Mission, "", {}, dir };
1287  entry = string_format( _( "Hide one or more missions to clean up the UI." ) );
1288  mission_key.add( { miss_id, false }, name_display_of( miss_id ),
1289  entry );
1290  }
1291  {
1292  int count = 0;
1293  if( !hidden_missions.empty() ) {
1294  count = hidden_missions[base_camps::all_directions.at( dir ).tab_order].size();
1295  }
1296 
1297  const mission_id miss_id = { Camp_Reveal_Mission, "", {}, dir };
1298  entry = string_format( _( "Reveal one or more missions previously hidden.\n"
1299  "Current number of hidden missions: %d" ),
1300  count );
1301  mission_key.add( { miss_id, false }, name_display_of( miss_id ),
1302  entry, false, count != 0 );
1303  }
1304  }
1305  }
1306 
1307  if( has_provides( "farming", dir ) ) {
1308  size_t plots = 0;
1309  const mission_id miss_id = { Camp_Plow, "", {}, dir };
1310  comp_list npc_list = get_mission_workers( miss_id );
1311  if( npc_list.empty() ) {
1312  entry = _( "Notes:\n"
1313  "Plow any spaces that have reverted to dirt or grass.\n\n" ) +
1314  farm_description( omt_trg, plots, farm_ops::plow ) +
1315  _( "\n\n"
1316  "Skill used: fabrication\n"
1317  "Difficulty: N/A\n"
1318  "Effects:\n"
1319  "> Restores only the plots created in the last expansion upgrade.\n"
1320  "> Does not damage existing crops.\n\n"
1321  "Risk: None\n"
1322  "Intensity: Moderate\n"
1323  "Time: 5 Min / Plot\n"
1324  "Positions: 0/1\n" );
1325  mission_key.add_start( miss_id, name_display_of( miss_id ),
1326  entry, plots > 0 );
1327  } else {
1328  entry = action_of( miss_id.id );
1329  bool avail = update_time_left( entry, npc_list );
1330  mission_key.add_return( miss_id,
1331  dir_abbr + _( " (Finish) Plow fields" ), entry, avail );
1332  }
1333  }
1334  if( has_provides( "farming", dir ) ) {
1335  size_t plots = 0;
1336  const mission_id miss_id = { Camp_Plant, "", {}, dir };
1337  comp_list npc_list = get_mission_workers( miss_id );
1338  if( npc_list.empty() ) {
1339  entry = _( "Notes:\n"
1340  "Plant designated seeds in the spaces that have already been "
1341  "tilled.\n\n" ) +
1342  farm_description( omt_trg, plots, farm_ops::plant ) +
1343  _( "\n\n"
1344  "Skill used: survival\n"
1345  "Difficulty: N/A\n"
1346  "Effects:\n"
1347  "> Choose which seed type or all of your seeds.\n"
1348  "> Stops when out of seeds or planting locations.\n"
1349  "> Will plant in ALL dirt mounds in the expansion.\n\n"
1350  "Risk: None\n"
1351  "Intensity: Moderate\n"
1352  "Time: 1 Min / Plot\n"
1353  "Positions: 0/1\n" );
1354  mission_key.add_start( miss_id,
1355  name_display_of( miss_id ), entry,
1356  plots > 0 && warm_enough_to_plant( omt_trg ) );
1357  } else {
1358  entry = action_of( miss_id.id );
1359  bool avail = update_time_left( entry, npc_list );
1360  mission_key.add_return( miss_id,
1361  dir_abbr + _( " (Finish) Plant Fields" ), entry, avail );
1362  }
1363  }
1364  if( has_provides( "farming", dir ) ) {
1365  size_t plots = 0;
1366  const mission_id miss_id = { Camp_Harvest, "", {}, dir };
1367  comp_list npc_list = get_mission_workers( miss_id );
1368  if( npc_list.empty() ) {
1369  entry = _( "Notes:\n"
1370  "Harvest any plants that are ripe and bring the produce back.\n\n" ) +
1371  farm_description( omt_trg, plots, farm_ops::harvest ) +
1372  _( "\n\n"
1373  "Skill used: survival\n"
1374  "Difficulty: N/A\n"
1375  "Effects:\n"
1376  "> Will dump all harvesting products onto your location.\n\n"
1377  "Risk: None\n"
1378  "Intensity: Moderate\n"
1379  "Time: 3 Min / Plot\n"
1380  "Positions: 0/1\n" );
1381  mission_key.add_start( miss_id,
1382  name_display_of( miss_id ), entry,
1383  plots > 0 );
1384  } else {
1385  entry = action_of( miss_id.id );
1386  bool avail = update_time_left( entry, npc_list );
1387  mission_key.add_return( miss_id,
1388  dir_abbr + _( " (Finish) Harvest Fields" ), entry, avail );
1389  }
1390  }
1391 }

◆ handle_hide_mission()

void basecamp::handle_hide_mission ( const point &  dir)

Definition at line 5908 of file faction_camp.cpp.

5909 {
5910  const base_camps::direction_data &base_data = base_camps::all_directions.at( dir );
5911  const size_t previously_hidden_count = hidden_missions[size_t( base_data.tab_order )].size();
5912 
5913  while( true ) {
5914  std::vector<std::string> pos_names;
5915  std::vector<ui_mission_id> reference;
5916  int choice = 0;
5917  pos_names.reserve( hidden_missions[size_t( base_data.tab_order )].size() );
5918  reference.reserve( hidden_missions[size_t( base_data.tab_order )].size() );
5919 
5920  for( ui_mission_id &miss_id : temp_ui_mission_keys[size_t( base_data.tab_order )] ) {
5921  if( !miss_id.ret &&
5922  miss_id.id.id != Camp_Reveal_Mission ) {
5923 
5924  // Filter out the onces we're hiding in this loop, as temp_ui_mission_keys isn't refreshed
5925  bool hidden = false;
5926  for( size_t i = previously_hidden_count; i < hidden_missions[size_t( base_data.tab_order )].size();
5927  i++ ) {
5928  if( is_equal( hidden_missions[size_t( base_data.tab_order )].at( i ), miss_id ) ) {
5929  hidden = true;
5930  break;
5931  }
5932  }
5933  if( !hidden ) {
5934  pos_names.push_back( name_display_of( miss_id.id ) );
5935  reference.push_back( miss_id );
5936  }
5937  }
5938  }
5939 
5940  choice = uilist( _( "Select mission(s) to hide, escape when done" ), pos_names );
5941 
5942  if( choice < 0 || static_cast<size_t>( choice ) >= pos_names.size() ) {
5943  popup( _( "You're done for now…" ) );
5944  return;
5945  }
5946 
5947  hidden_missions[size_t( base_data.tab_order )].push_back( reference[choice] );
5948  }
5949 }

◆ handle_mission()

bool basecamp::handle_mission ( const ui_mission_id &  miss_id)

1717 {
1718  if( miss_id.id.id == No_Mission ) {
1719  return true;
1720  }
1721 
1722  const point &miss_dir = miss_id.id.dir.value();
1723  // All missions should supply dir. Bug if they don't, so blow up during testing.
1724 
1725  const tripoint_abs_omt omt_trg = omt_pos + miss_dir;
1726 
1727  switch( miss_id.id.id ) {
1728  case Camp_Distribute_Food:
1729  distribute_food();
1730  break;
1731 
1732  case Camp_Determine_Leadership:
1733  choose_new_leader();
1734  break;
1735 
1736  case Camp_Have_Meal:
1737  player_eats_meal();
1738  break;
1739 
1740  case Camp_Hide_Mission:
1741  handle_hide_mission( miss_id.id.dir.value() );
1742  break;
1743 
1744  case Camp_Reveal_Mission:
1745  handle_reveal_mission( miss_id.id.dir.value() );
1746  break;
1747 
1748  case Camp_Assign_Jobs:
1749  job_assignment_ui();
1750  break;
1751 
1752  case Camp_Assign_Workers:
1753  worker_assignment_ui();
1754  break;
1755 
1756  case Camp_Abandon:
1757  abandon_camp();
1758  break;
1759 
1760  case Camp_Upgrade:
1761  if( miss_id.ret ) {
1762  upgrade_return( miss_id.id );
1763  } else {
1764  start_upgrade( miss_id.id );
1765  }
1766  break;
1767 
1768  case Camp_Emergency_Recall:
1769  emergency_recall( miss_id.id );
1770  break;
1771 
1772  case Camp_Crafting:
1773  if( miss_id.ret ) {
1774  const std::string bldg = recipe_group::get_building_of_recipe( miss_id.id.parameters );
1775 
1776  std::string msg;
1777 
1778  if( bldg == base_recipe_group_string ) {
1779  msg = _( "returns to you with something…" );
1780 
1781  } else if( bldg == cook_recipe_group_string ) {
1782  msg = _( "returns from your kitchen with something…" );
1783 
1784  } else if( bldg == farm_recipe_group_string ) {
1785  msg = _( "returns from your farm with something…" );
1786 
1787  } else if( bldg == smith_recipe_group_string ) {
1788  msg = _( "returns from your blacksmith shop with something…" );
1789  }
1790 
1791  else {
1792  msg = _( "returns to you with something…" );
1793  }
1794 
1795  crafting_mission_return( miss_id.id,
1796  msg,
1797  skill_construction.str(), 2 );
1798  } else {
1799  const std::string bldg = recipe_group::get_building_of_recipe( miss_id.id.parameters );
1800  start_crafting( recipe_group::get_building_of_recipe( miss_id.id.parameters ), miss_id.id );
1801  }
1802  break;
1803 
1804  case Camp_Gather_Materials:
1805  if( miss_id.ret ) {
1806  gathering_return( miss_id.id, 3_hours );
1807  } else {
1808  start_mission( miss_id.id, 3_hours, true,
1809  _( "departs to search for materials…" ), false, {}, skill_survival, 0, LIGHT_EXERCISE );
1810  }
1811  break;
1812 
1813  case Camp_Collect_Firewood:
1814  if( miss_id.ret ) {
1815  gathering_return( miss_id.id, 3_hours );
1816  } else {
1817  start_mission( miss_id.id, 3_hours, true,
1818  _( "departs to search for firewood…" ), false, {}, skill_survival, 0, LIGHT_EXERCISE );
1819  }
1820  break;
1821 
1822  case Camp_Menial:
1823  if( miss_id.ret ) {
1824  menial_return( miss_id.id );
1825  } else {
1826  start_menial_labor();
1827  }
1828  break;
1829 
1830  case Camp_Survey_Field:
1831  if( miss_id.ret ) {
1832  survey_field_return( miss_id.id );
1833  } else {
1834  start_mission( miss_id.id, 0_hours, true,
1835  _( "departs to look for suitable fields…" ), false, {}, skill_gun, 0, MODERATE_EXERCISE );
1836  }
1837  break;
1838 
1839  case Camp_Survey_Expansion:
1840  if( miss_id.ret ) {
1841  survey_return( miss_id.id );
1842  } else {
1843  start_mission( miss_id.id, 3_hours, true,
1844  _( "departs to survey land…" ), false, {}, skill_gun, 0, MODERATE_EXERCISE );
1845  }
1846  break;
1847 
1848  case Camp_Cut_Logs:
1849  if( miss_id.ret ) {
1850  mission_return( miss_id.id, 6_hours, true,
1851  _( "returns from working in the woods…" ),
1852  skill_construction.str(), 2 );
1853  } else {
1854  start_cut_logs( miss_id.id, ACTIVE_EXERCISE );
1855  }
1856  break;
1857 
1858  case Camp_Clearcut:
1859  if( miss_id.ret ) {
1860  mission_return( miss_id.id, 6_hours, true,
1861  _( "returns from working in the woods…" ),
1862  skill_construction.str(), 1 );
1863  } else {
1864  start_clearcut( miss_id.id, ACTIVE_EXERCISE );
1865  }
1866  break;
1867 
1868  case Camp_Setup_Hide_Site:
1869  if( miss_id.ret ) {
1870  mission_return( miss_id.id, 3_hours, true,
1871  _( "returns from working on the hide site…" ), skill_survival.str(), 3 );
1872  } else {
1873  start_setup_hide_site( miss_id.id, LIGHT_EXERCISE );
1874  }
1875  break;
1876 
1877  case Camp_Relay_Hide_Site:
1878  if( miss_id.ret ) {
1879  const std::string msg = _( "returns from shuttling gear between the hide site…" );
1880  mission_return( miss_id.id, 3_hours, true,
1881  msg, skill_survival.str(), 3 );
1882  } else {
1883  start_relay_hide_site( miss_id.id, LIGHT_EXERCISE );
1884  }
1885  break;
1886 
1887  case Camp_Foraging:
1888  if( miss_id.ret ) {
1889  gathering_return( miss_id.id, 4_hours );
1890  } else {
1891  start_mission( miss_id.id, 4_hours, true,
1892  _( "departs to search for edible plants…" ), false, {}, skill_survival, 0, LIGHT_EXERCISE );
1893  }
1894  break;
1895 
1896  case Camp_Trapping:
1897  if( miss_id.ret ) {
1898  gathering_return( miss_id.id, 6_hours );
1899  } else {
1900  start_mission( miss_id.id, 6_hours, true,
1901  _( "departs to set traps for small animals…" ), false, {}, skill_traps, 0, LIGHT_EXERCISE );
1902  }
1903  break;
1904 
1905  case Camp_Hunting:
1906  if( miss_id.ret ) {
1907  gathering_return( miss_id.id, 6_hours );
1908  } else {
1909  start_mission( miss_id.id, 6_hours, true,
1910  _( "departs to hunt for meat…" ), false, {}, skill_gun, 0, MODERATE_EXERCISE );
1911  }
1912  break;
1913 
1914  case Camp_OM_Fortifications:
1915  if( miss_id.ret ) {
1916  fortifications_return( miss_id.id );
1917  } else {
1918  std::string bldg_exp = miss_id.id.parameters;
1919  start_fortifications( miss_id.id, ACTIVE_EXERCISE );
1920  }
1921  break;
1922 
1923  case Camp_Recruiting:
1924  if( miss_id.ret ) {
1925  recruit_return( miss_id.id,
1926  recruit_evaluation() );
1927  } else {
1928  start_mission( miss_id.id, 4_days, true,
1929  _( "departs to search for recruits…" ), false, {}, skill_gun, 0, MODERATE_EXERCISE );
1930  }
1931  break;
1932 
1933  case Camp_Scouting:
1934  case Camp_Combat_Patrol:
1935  if( miss_id.ret ) {
1936  combat_mission_return( miss_id.id );
1937  } else {
1938  start_combat_mission( miss_id.id, BRISK_EXERCISE );
1939  }
1940  break;
1941 
1942  case Camp_Chop_Shop: // Removed during 0.E
1943  debugmsg( "Obsolete Function. Use Vehicle Deconstruct zone instead. Recover your companion with Emergency Recall." );
1944  break;
1945 
1946  case Camp_Plow:
1947  case Camp_Plant:
1948  case Camp_Harvest:
1949  if( miss_id.ret ) {
1950  farm_return( miss_id.id, omt_trg );
1951  } else {
1952  start_farm_op( omt_trg, miss_id.id, MODERATE_EXERCISE );
1953  }
1954  break;
1955 
1956  default:
1957  break;
1958  }
1959 
1960  return true;
1961 }

◆ hunting_results()

void basecamp::hunting_results ( int  skill,
const mission_id &  miss_id,
int  attempts,
int  difficulty 
)

spawn items or corpses based on search attempts

Parameters
skillskill level of the search
taskstring to identify what types of corpses to provide ( _faction_camp_hunting or _faction_camp_trapping )
attemptsnumber of skill checks to make
difficultya random number from 0 to difficulty is created for each attempt, and if skill is higher, an item or corpse is spawned

Definition at line 4711 of file faction_camp.cpp.

4712 {
4713  // corpses do not exist as discrete items, so we use monster groups instead
4714  int base_group_chance = GROUP_CAMP_HUNTING->freq_total;
4715  int mission_specific_chance = 0;
4716  mongroup_id mission_specific_group;
4717  if( miss_id.id == Camp_Trapping ) {
4718  mission_specific_group = GROUP_CAMP_TRAPPING;
4719  mission_specific_chance += GROUP_CAMP_TRAPPING->freq_total;
4720  } else if( miss_id.id == Camp_Hunting ) {
4721  mission_specific_group = GROUP_CAMP_HUNTING_LARGE;
4722  mission_specific_chance += GROUP_CAMP_HUNTING_LARGE->freq_total;
4723  }
4724  const int total_chance = base_group_chance + mission_specific_chance;
4725  int successful_hunts = 0;
4726  for( int i = 0; i < attempts; i++ ) {
4727  if( skill > rng( 0, difficulty ) ) {
4728  successful_hunts++;
4729  }
4730  }
4731 
4732  if( successful_hunts <= 0 ) {
4733  return;
4734  }
4735 
4736  int results_from_base_group = 0;
4737  int results_from_mission_group = 0;
4738  for( ; successful_hunts > 0; successful_hunts-- ) {
4739  if( x_in_y( base_group_chance, total_chance ) ) {
4740  results_from_base_group++;
4741  } else {
4742  results_from_mission_group++;
4743  }
4744  }
4745 
4746  make_corpse_from_group( MonsterGroupManager::GetResultFromGroup( GROUP_CAMP_HUNTING,
4747  &results_from_base_group ) );
4748  make_corpse_from_group( MonsterGroupManager::GetResultFromGroup( mission_specific_group,
4749  &results_from_mission_group ) );
4750 }

2358  werase( w_jobs );
2359  const size_t top_of_page = entries_per_page * ( selection / entries_per_page );
2360  for( int i = 0; i < FULL_SCREEN_HEIGHT - 2; i++ ) {
2361  mvwputch( w_jobs, point( 45, i ), BORDER_COLOR, LINE_XOXO );
2362  }
2363  draw_border( w_jobs );
2364  mvwprintz( w_jobs, point( 46, 1 ), c_white, _( "Job/Priority" ) );
2365  const nc_color col = c_white;
2366  const std::string no_npcs = _( "There are no NPCs stationed here" );
2367  if( !stationed_npcs.empty() ) {
2368  draw_scrollbar( w_jobs, selection, entries_per_page, stationed_npcs.size(),
2369  point( 0, 3 ) );
2370  for( size_t i = top_of_page; i < stationed_npcs.size(); i++ ) {
2371  const int y = i - top_of_page + 3;
2372  trim_and_print( w_jobs, point( 1, y ), 43, selection == i ? hilite( col ) : col,
2373  stationed_npcs[i]->disp_name() );
2374  }
2375  if( selection < stationed_npcs.size() ) {
2376  int start_y = 3;
2377  if( cur_npc ) {
2378  if( cur_npc->has_job() ) {
2379  for( activity_id &elem : cur_npc->job.get_prioritised_vector() ) {
2380  const int priority = cur_npc->job.get_priority_of_job( elem );
2381  player_activity test_act = player_activity( elem );
2382  mvwprintz( w_jobs, point( 46, start_y ), c_light_gray, string_format( _( "%s : %s" ),
2383  test_act.get_verb(), std::to_string( priority ) ) );
2384  start_y++;
2385  }
2386  } else {
2387  mvwprintz( w_jobs, point( 46, start_y ), c_light_red, _( "No current job." ) );
2388  }
2389  }
2390  } else {
2391  mvwprintz( w_jobs, point( 46, 4 ), c_light_red, no_npcs );
2392  }
2393  } else {
2394  mvwprintz( w_jobs, point( 46, 4 ), c_light_red, no_npcs );
2395  }
2396  mvwprintz( w_jobs, point( 1, FULL_SCREEN_HEIGHT - 2 ), c_light_gray,
2397  _( "Press %s to inspect this follower." ), ctxt.get_desc( "INSPECT_NPC" ) );
2398  mvwprintz( w_jobs, point( 1, FULL_SCREEN_HEIGHT - 1 ), c_light_gray,
2399  _( "Press %s to change this workers job priorities." ), ctxt.get_desc( "CONFIRM" ) );
2400  wnoutrefresh( w_jobs );
2401  } );
2402 
2403  while( true ) {
2404  // create a list of npcs stationed at this camp
2405  stationed_npcs.clear();
2406  for( const auto &elem : get_npcs_assigned() ) {
2407  if( elem ) {
2408  stationed_npcs.push_back( elem.get() );
2409  }
2410  }
2411  cur_npc = nullptr;
2412  // entries_per_page * page number
2413  if( !stationed_npcs.empty() ) {
2414  cur_npc = stationed_npcs[selection];
2415  }
2416 
2417  ui_manager::redraw();
2418 
2419  const std::string action = ctxt.handle_input();
2420  if( action == "INSPECT_NPC" ) {
2421  if( cur_npc ) {
2422  cur_npc->disp_info();
2423  }
2424  } else if( navigate_ui_list( action, selection, 5, stationed_npcs.size(), true ) ) {
2425  } else if( action == "CONFIRM" ) {
2426  if( cur_npc ) {
2427  while( true ) {
2428  uilist smenu;
2429  smenu.text = _( "Assign job priority (0 to disable)" );
2430  int count = 0;
2431  std::vector<activity_id> job_vec = cur_npc->job.get_prioritised_vector();
2432  smenu.addentry( count, true, 'C', _( "Clear all priorities" ) );
2433  count++;
2434  for( const activity_id &elem : job_vec ) {
2435  player_activity test_act = player_activity( elem );
2436  const int priority = cur_npc->job.get_priority_of_job( elem );
2437  smenu.addentry( count, true, MENU_AUTOASSIGN, string_format( _( "%s : %s" ), test_act.get_verb(),
2438  std::to_string( priority ) ) );
2439  count++;
2440  }
2441  smenu.query();
2442  if( smenu.ret == UILIST_CANCEL ) {
2443  break;
2444  }
2445  if( smenu.ret == 0 ) {
2446  cur_npc->job.clear_all_priorities();
2447  } else if( smenu.ret > 0 && smenu.ret <= static_cast<int>( job_vec.size() ) ) {
2448  activity_id sel_job = job_vec[size_t( smenu.ret - 1 )];
2449  player_activity test_act = player_activity( sel_job );
2450  const std::string formatted = string_format( _( "Priority for %s " ), test_act.get_verb() );
2451  const int amount = string_input_popup()
2452  .title( formatted )
2453  .width( 20 )
2454  .only_digits( true )
2455  .query_int();
2456  cur_npc->job.set_task_priority( sel_job, amount );
2457  } else {
2458  break;
2459  }
2460  }
2461  }
2462  } else if( action == "QUIT" ) {
2463  break;
2464  }
2465  }
2466 }

266 {
267  const auto &e = expansions.find( dir );
268  if( e == expansions.end() ) {
269  return "null";
270  }
271  const expansion_data &e_data = e->second;
272 
273  int cur_level = -1;
274  for( int i = 0; i < base_camps::max_upgrade_by_type( e_data.type ); i++ ) {
275  const std::string candidate = base_camps::faction_encode_abs( e_data, i );
276  if( e_data.provides.find( candidate ) == e_data.provides.end() ) {
277  break;
278  } else {
279  cur_level = i;
280  }
281  }

283  return base_camps::faction_encode_abs( e_data, cur_level + offset );
284  }

5968  tripoint new_spot = target_bay.getlocal( get_dumping_spot() );
5969  // Special handling for liquids
5970  // find any storage-zoned LIQUIDCONT we can dump them in, set that as the item's destination instead
5971  if( result.made_of( phase_id::LIQUID ) ) {
5972  for( tripoint_abs_ms potential_spot : get_liquid_dumping_spot() ) {
5973  // No items at a potential spot? Set the destination there and stop checking.
5974  // We could check if the item at the tile are the same as the item we're placing, but liquids of the same typeid
5975  // don't always mix depending on their components...
5976  if( target_bay.i_at( target_bay.getlocal( potential_spot ) ).empty() ) {
5977  new_spot = target_bay.getlocal( potential_spot );
5978  break;
5979  }
5980  // We've processed the last spot and haven't found anywhere to put it, we'll end up using dumping_spot.
5981  // Throw a warning to let players know what's going on. Unfortunately we can't back out of finishing the mission this deep in the process.
5982  if( potential_spot == get_liquid_dumping_spot().back() ) {
5983  popup( _( "No eligible locations found to place resulting liquids, placing them at random.\n\nEligible locations must be a terrain OR furniture (not item) that can contain liquid, and does not already have any items on its tile." ) );
5984  }
5985  }
5986  }
5987  target_bay.add_item_or_charges( new_spot, result, true );
5988  apply_camp_ownership( target_bay, new_spot, 10 );

◆ recruit_evaluation() [2/2]

int basecamp::recruit_evaluation ( int &  sbase,
int &  sexpansions,
int &  sfaction,
int &  sbonus 
) const

Definition at line 5390 of file faction_camp.cpp.

5391 {
5392  auto e = expansions.find( base_camps::base_dir );
5393  if( e == expansions.end() ) {
5394  sbase = 0;
5395  sexpansions = 0;
5396  sfaction = 0;
5397  sbonus = 0;
5398  return 0;
5399  }
5400  sbase = e->second.cur_level * 5;
5401  sexpansions = expansions.size() * 2;
5402 
5403  //How could we ever starve?
5404  //More than 5 farms at recruiting base
5405  int farm = 0;
5406  for( const point &dir : directions ) {
5407  if( has_provides( "farming", dir ) ) {
5408  farm++;
5409  }
5410  }
5411  sfaction = std::min( fac()->food_supply.kcal() / 10000, 10 );
5412  sfaction += std::min( camp_discipline() / 10, 5 );
5413  sfaction += std::min( camp_morale() / 10, 5 );
5414 
5415  //Secret or Hidden Bonus
5416  //Please avoid openly discussing so that there is some mystery to the system
5417  sbonus = 0;
5418  if( farm >= 5 ) {
5419  sbonus += 10;
5420  }
5421  //More machine than man
5422  //Bionics count > 10, respect > 75
5423  if( get_player_character().get_bionics().size() > 10 && camp_discipline() > 75 ) {
5424  sbonus += 10;
5425  }
5426  //Survival of the fittest
5427  if( g->get_kill_tracker().npc_kill_count() > 10 ) {
5428  sbonus += 10;
5429  }
5430  return sbase + sexpansions + sfaction + sbonus;
5431 }

void basecamp::recruit_return ( const mission_id &  miss_id,

4271 {
4272  const std::string msg = _( "returns from searching for recruits with "
4273  "a bit more experience…" );
4274  npc_ptr comp = mission_return( miss_id, 4_days, true, msg, skill_recruiting.str(), 2 );
4275  if( comp == nullptr ) {
4276  return;
4277  }
4278 
4279  npc_ptr recruit;
4280  //Success of finding an NPC to recruit, based on survival/tracking
4281  float skill = comp->get_skill_level( skill_survival );
4282  if( rng( 1, 20 ) + skill > 17 ) {
4283  recruit = make_shared_fast<npc>();
4284  recruit->normalize();
4285  recruit->randomize();
4286  popup( _( "%s encountered %s…" ), comp->get_name(), recruit->get_name() );
4287  } else {
4288  popup( _( "%s didn't find anyone to recruit…" ), comp->get_name() );
4289  return;
4290  }
4291  //Chance of convincing them to come back
4292  skill = ( 100 * comp->get_skill_level( skill_speech ) + score ) / 100;
4293  if( rng( 1, 20 ) + skill > 19 ) {
4294  popup( _( "%s convinced %s to hear a recruitment offer from you…" ), comp->get_name(),
4295  recruit->get_name() );
4296  } else {
4297  popup( _( "%s wasn't interested in anything %s had to offer…" ), recruit->get_name(),
4298  comp->get_name() );
4299  return;
4300  }
4301  //Stat window
4302  int rec_m = 0;
4303  int appeal = rng( -5, 3 ) + std::min( skill / 3, 3.0f );
4304  int food_desire = rng( 0, 5 );
4305  while( true ) {
4306  std::string description = _( "NPC Overview:\n\n" );
4307  description += string_format( _( "Name: %s\n\n" ), right_justify( recruit->get_name(), 20 ) );
4308  description += string_format( _( "Strength: %10d\n" ), recruit->str_max );
4309  description += string_format( _( "Dexterity: %10d\n" ), recruit->dex_max );
4310  description += string_format( _( "Intelligence: %10d\n" ), recruit->int_max );
4311  description += string_format( _( "Perception: %10d\n\n" ), recruit->per_max );
4312  description += _( "Top 3 Skills:\n" );
4313 
4314  const auto skillslist = Skill::get_skills_sorted_by(
4315  [&]( const Skill & a, const Skill & b ) {
4316  const int level_a = recruit->get_skill_level( a.ident() );
4317  const int level_b = recruit->get_skill_level( b.ident() );
4318  return localized_compare( std::make_pair( -level_a, a.name() ),
4319  std::make_pair( -level_b, b.name() ) );
4320  } );
4321 
4322  description += string_format( "%s: %4d\n", right_justify( skillslist[0]->name(), 12 ),
4323  static_cast<int>( recruit->get_skill_level( skillslist[0]->ident() ) ) );
4324  description += string_format( "%s: %4d\n", right_justify( skillslist[1]->name(), 12 ),
4325  static_cast<int>( recruit->get_skill_level( skillslist[1]->ident() ) ) );
4326  description += string_format( "%s: %4d\n\n", right_justify( skillslist[2]->name(), 12 ),
4327  static_cast<int>( recruit->get_skill_level( skillslist[2]->ident() ) ) );
4328 
4329  description += _( "Asking for:\n" );
4330  description += string_format( _( "> Food: %10d days\n\n" ), food_desire );
4331  description += string_format( _( "Faction Food:%9d days\n\n" ),
4332  camp_food_supply_days( NO_EXERCISE ) );
4333  description += string_format( _( "Recruit Chance: %10d%%\n\n" ),
4334  std::min( 100 * ( 10 + appeal ) / 20, 100 ) );
4335  description += _( "Select an option:" );
4336 
4337  std::vector<std::string> rec_options;
4338  rec_options.emplace_back( _( "Increase Food" ) );
4339  rec_options.emplace_back( _( "Decrease Food" ) );
4340  rec_options.emplace_back( _( "Make Offer" ) );
4341  rec_options.emplace_back( _( "Not Interested" ) );
4342 
4343  rec_m = uilist( description, rec_options );
4344  if( rec_m < 0 || rec_m == 3 || static_cast<size_t>( rec_m ) >= rec_options.size() ) {
4345  popup( _( "You decide you aren't interested…" ) );
4346  return;
4347  }
4348 
4349  if( rec_m == 0 && food_desire + 1 <= camp_food_supply_days( NO_EXERCISE ) ) {
4350  food_desire++;
4351  appeal++;
4352  }
4353  if( rec_m == 1 ) {
4354  if( food_desire > 0 ) {
4355  food_desire--;
4356  appeal--;
4357  }
4358  }
4359  if( rec_m == 2 ) {
4360  break;
4361  }
4362  }
4363  // Roll for recruitment
4364  if( rng( 1, 20 ) + appeal >= 10 ) {
4365  popup( _( "%s has been convinced to join!" ), recruit->get_name() );
4366  } else {
4367  popup( _( "%s wasn't interested…" ), recruit->get_name() );
4368  // nullptr;
4369  return;
4370  }
4371  // Time durations always subtract from camp food supply
4372  camp_food_supply( 1_days * food_desire );
4373  avatar &player_character = get_avatar();
4374  recruit->spawn_at_precise( player_character.get_location() + point( -4, -4 ) );
4375  overmap_buffer.insert_npc( recruit );
4376  recruit->form_opinion( player_character );
4377  recruit->mission = NPC_MISSION_NULL;
4378  recruit->add_new_mission( mission::reserve_random( ORIGIN_ANY_NPC,
4379  recruit->global_omt_location(),
4380  recruit->getID() ) );
4381  talk_function::follow( *recruit );
4382  g->load_npcs();
4383 }

◆ search_results()

void basecamp::search_results ( int  skill,
const item_group_id &  group_id,
int  attempts,
int  difficulty 
)

spawn items or corpses based on search attempts

Parameters
skillskill level of the search
group_idname of the item_group that provides the items
attemptsnumber of skill checks to make
difficultya random number from 0 to difficulty is created for each attempt, and if skill is higher, an item or corpse is spawned

◆ start_farm_op()

void basecamp::start_farm_op ( const tripoint_abs_omt &  omt_tgt,

)

Definition at line 3679 of file faction_camp.cpp.

3681 {
3682  farm_ops op = farm_ops::plow;
3683  if( miss_id.id == Camp_Plow ) {
3684  op = farm_ops::plow;
3685  } else if( miss_id.id == Camp_Plant ) {
3686  op = farm_ops::plant;
3687  } else if( miss_id.id == Camp_Harvest ) {
3688  op = farm_ops::harvest;
3689  } else {
3690  debugmsg( "Farm operations called with no matching operation" );
3691  return;
3692  }
3693 
3694  std::pair<size_t, std::string> farm_data = farm_action( omt_tgt, op );
3695  size_t plots_cnt = farm_data.first;
3696  if( !plots_cnt ) {
3697  return;
3698  }
3699 
3700  time_duration work = 0_minutes;
3701  switch( op ) {
3702  case farm_ops::harvest:
3703  work += 3_minutes * plots_cnt;
3704  start_mission( miss_id, work, true,
3705  _( "begins to harvest the field…" ), false, {}, skill_survival, 1, exertion_level );
3706  break;
3707  case farm_ops::plant: {
3708  inventory_filter_preset seed_filter( []( const item_location & loc ) {
3709  return loc->is_seed() && loc->typeId() != itype_marloss_seed && loc->typeId() != itype_fungal_seeds;
3710  } );
3711  drop_locations seed_selection = give_basecamp_equipment( seed_filter,
3712  _( "Which seeds do you wish to have planted?" ), _( "Selected seeds" ),
3713  _( "You have no additional seeds to give your companions…" ) );
3714  if( seed_selection.empty() ) {
3715  return;
3716  }
3717  size_t seed_cnt = 0;
3718  std::vector<item *> to_plant;
3719  for( std::pair<item_location, int> &seeds : seed_selection ) {
3720  size_t num_seeds = seeds.second;
3721  item_location seed = seeds.first;
3722  seed.overflow();
3723  if( seed->count_by_charges() ) {
3724  seed->charges = num_seeds;
3725  }
3726  to_plant.push_back( &*seed );
3727  seed_cnt += num_seeds;
3728  }
3729 
3730  if( !seed_cnt ) {
3731  return;
3732  }
3733  work += 1_minutes * seed_cnt;
3734  start_mission( miss_id, work, true,
3735  _( "begins planting the field…" ), false, to_plant,
3736  skill_survival, 1, exertion_level );
3737  break;
3738  }
3739  case farm_ops::plow:
3740  work += 5_minutes * plots_cnt;
3741  start_mission( miss_id, work, true, _( "begins plowing the field…" ), false, {}, exertion_level );
3742  break;
3743  default:
3744  debugmsg( "Farm operations called with no operation" );
3745  }
3746 }

◆ start_fortifications()

void basecamp::start_fortifications ( const mission_id &  miss_id,
float  exertion_level 
)

Called when a companion is sent to start fortifications.

Definition at line 2811 of file faction_camp.cpp.

2812 {
2813  std::vector<std::string> allowed_locations = {
2814  "forest", "forest_thick", "forest_water", "forest_trail", "field"
2815  };
2816  popup( _( "Select a start and end point. Line must be straight. Fields, forests, and "
2817  "swamps are valid fortification locations. In addition to existing fortification "
2818  "constructions." ) );
2819  tripoint_abs_omt start = om_target_tile( omt_pos, 2, 90, allowed_locations, ot_match_type::type );
2820  popup( _( "Select an end point." ) );
2821  tripoint_abs_omt stop = om_target_tile( omt_pos, 2, 90, allowed_locations, ot_match_type::type,
2822  true, false, start );
2823  if( start != tripoint_abs_omt( -999, -999, -999 ) &&
2824  stop != tripoint_abs_omt( -999, -999, -999 ) ) {
2825  const recipe &making = recipe_id( miss_id.parameters ).obj();
2826  bool change_x = start.x() != stop.x();
2827  bool change_y = start.y() != stop.y();
2828  if( change_x && change_y ) {
2829  popup( _( "Construction line must be straight!" ) );
2830  return;
2831  }
2832  if( miss_id.parameters == faction_wall_level_n_1_string ) {
2833  std::vector<tripoint_abs_omt> tmp_line = line_to( stop, start );
2834  int line_count = tmp_line.size();
2835  int yes_count = 0;
2836  for( tripoint_abs_omt &elem : tmp_line ) {
2837  if( std::find( fortifications.begin(), fortifications.end(), elem ) != fortifications.end() ) {
2838  yes_count += 1;
2839  }
2840  }
2841  if( yes_count < line_count ) {
2842  popup( _( "Spiked pits must be built over existing trenches!" ) );
2843  return;
2844  }
2845  }
2846  std::vector<tripoint_abs_omt> fortify_om;
2847  if( ( change_x && stop.x() < start.x() ) || ( change_y && stop.y() < start.y() ) ) {
2848  //line_to doesn't include the origin point
2849  fortify_om.push_back( stop );
2850  std::vector<tripoint_abs_omt> tmp_line = line_to( stop, start );
2851  fortify_om.insert( fortify_om.end(), tmp_line.begin(), tmp_line.end() );
2852  } else {
2853  fortify_om.push_back( start );
2854  std::vector<tripoint_abs_omt> tmp_line = line_to( start, stop );
2855  fortify_om.insert( fortify_om.end(), tmp_line.begin(), tmp_line.end() );
2856  }
2857  int trips = 0;
2858  time_duration build_time = 0_hours;
2859  time_duration travel_time = 0_hours;
2860  int dist = 0;
2861  for( tripoint_abs_omt &fort_om : fortify_om ) {
2862  bool valid = false;
2863  const oter_id &omt_ref = overmap_buffer.ter( fort_om );
2864  for( const std::string &pos_om : allowed_locations ) {
2865  if( omt_ref.id().c_str() == pos_om ) {
2866  valid = true;
2867  break;
2868  }
2869  }
2870 
2871  if( !valid ) {
2872  popup( _( "Invalid terrain in construction path." ) );
2873  return;
2874  }
2875  trips += 2;
2876  build_time += making.batch_duration( get_player_character() );
2877  dist += rl_dist( fort_om.xy(), omt_pos.xy() );
2878  travel_time += companion_travel_time_calc( fort_om, omt_pos, 0_minutes, 2 );
2879  }
2880  time_duration total_time = base_camps::to_workdays( travel_time + build_time );
2881  int need_food = time_to_food( total_time, exertion_level );
2882  if( !query_yn( _( "Trip Estimate:\n%s" ), camp_trip_description( total_time, build_time,
2883  travel_time, dist, trips, need_food ) ) ) {
2884  return;
2885  } else if( !making.deduped_requirements().can_make_with_inventory( _inv,
2886  making.get_component_filter(), ( fortify_om.size() * 2 ) - 2 ) ) {

2888  return;
2889  }

2895  return;
2896  }

2899  miss_id, total_time, true,
2900  _( "begins constructing fortifications…" ), false, {},
2901  exertion_level, making.required_skills );

3253  if( element->expansion == dir ) {

3255  debugmsg( "Trying to start construction of a salt water pipe that's already been constructed" );

3257  }

3261  break;

3271  "forest_water"; // That's what a swamp is called, for some reason.
3272  std::vector<std::string> allowed_locations = {
3273  "forest", "forest_thick", "forest_trail", "field", "road"
3274  };
3275  PathMap path_map;
3276 
3277  for( int i = -max_salt_water_pipe_distance; i <= max_salt_water_pipe_distance; i++ ) {
3278  for( int k = -max_salt_water_pipe_distance; k <= max_salt_water_pipe_distance; k++ ) {
3279  tripoint_abs_omt tile = tripoint_abs_omt( omt_pos.x() + dir.x + connection_dir.x + i,
3280  omt_pos.y() + dir.y + connection_dir.y + k, omt_pos.z() );
3281  const oter_id &omt_ref = overmap_buffer.ter( tile );
3282  bool match = false;
3283  for( const std::string &pos_om : allowed_locations ) {
3284  if( omt_ref->get_type_id() == oter_type_str_id( pos_om ) ) {
3285  match = true;
3286  break;
3287  }
3288  }
3289  if( match ) {
3290  path_map[max_salt_water_pipe_distance + i][max_salt_water_pipe_distance + k] = salt_pipe_legal;
3291  } else if( omt_ref->get_type_id() == oter_type_str_id( allowed_start_location ) ) {
3292  path_map[max_salt_water_pipe_distance + i][max_salt_water_pipe_distance + k] = salt_pipe_swamp;
3293  } else {
3294  path_map[max_salt_water_pipe_distance + i][max_salt_water_pipe_distance + k] = salt_pipe_illegal;
3295  }
3296  // if this is an expansion tile, forbid it. Only allocated ones have their type changed.
3297  if( i >= -dir.x - connection_dir.x - 1 && i <= -dir.x - connection_dir.x + 1 &&
3298  k >= -dir.y - connection_dir.y - 1 && k <= -dir.y - connection_dir.y + 1 ) {
3299  path_map[max_salt_water_pipe_distance + i][max_salt_water_pipe_distance + k] = salt_pipe_illegal;
3300  }
3301  }
3302  }
3303 
3304  if( path_map[max_salt_water_pipe_distance][max_salt_water_pipe_distance] == salt_pipe_illegal ) {
3305  auto e = expansions.find( dir );
3306  basecamp::update_provides( miss_id.parameters, e->second );
3307 
3308  popup( _( "This functionality cannot be constructed as the tile directly adjacent to "
3309  "this expansion is not of a type a pipe can be constructed through. Supported "
3310  "terrain is forest, field, road, and swamp. This recipe will now be "
3311  "removed from the set of available recipes and won't show up again." ) );
3312  return;
3313  }
3314 
3315  point destination;
3316  double destination_cost = -10000.0;
3317  bool path_found = false;
3318 
3319  if( path_map[max_salt_water_pipe_distance][max_salt_water_pipe_distance] ==
3320  salt_pipe_swamp ) { // The connection_dir tile is a swamp tile
3321  destination = point_zero;
3322  path_found = true;
3323  } else {
3324  path_map[max_salt_water_pipe_distance][max_salt_water_pipe_distance] =
3325  1.0; // Always an orthogonal connection to the connection tile.
3326 
3327  for( int distance = 1; distance <= max_salt_water_pipe_length; distance++ ) {
3328  int dist = distance > max_salt_water_pipe_distance ? max_salt_water_pipe_distance : distance;
3329  for( int i = -dist; i <= dist; i++ ) { // No path that can be extended can reach further than dist.
3330  for( int k = -dist; k <= dist; k++ ) {
3331  if( path_map[max_salt_water_pipe_distance + i][max_salt_water_pipe_distance + k] >
3332  0.0 ) { // Tile has been assigned a distance and isn't a swamp
3333  point temp = check_salt_pipe_neighbors( path_map, { i, k } );
3334  if( temp != point( -999, -999 ) ) {
3335  if( path_map[max_salt_water_pipe_distance + temp.x][max_salt_water_pipe_distance + temp.y] >
3336  destination_cost ) {
3337  destination_cost = path_map[max_salt_water_pipe_distance + temp.x][max_salt_water_pipe_distance +
3338  temp.y];
3339  destination = temp;
3340  path_found = true;
3341  }
3342  }
3343  }
3344  }
3345  }
3346  }
3347  }
3348 
3349  if( !path_found ) {
3350  auto e = expansions.find( dir );
3351  basecamp::update_provides( miss_id.parameters, e->second );
3352 
3353  popup( _( "This functionality cannot be constructed as no valid path to a swamp has "
3354  "been found with a maximum length (20 tiles) at a maximum range of 10 tiles. "
3355  "Supported terrain is forest, field, and road. This recipe will now be "
3356  "removed from the set of available recipes and won't show up again." ) );
3357  return;
3358  };
3359 
3360  point candidate;
3361  // Flip the sign of the starting swamp tile to fit the logic expecting positive values rather than check that it isn't the first one every time.
3362  path_map[max_salt_water_pipe_distance + destination.x][max_salt_water_pipe_distance + destination.y]
3363  = -path_map[max_salt_water_pipe_distance + destination.x][max_salt_water_pipe_distance +
3364  destination.y];
3365 
3366  while( destination != point_zero ) {
3367  pipe->segments.push_back( { tripoint_abs_omt( omt_pos.x() + dir.x + connection_dir.x + destination.x, omt_pos.y() + dir.y + connection_dir.y + destination.y, omt_pos.z() ), false, false } );
3368  path_found = false; // Reuse of existing variable after its original usability has been passed.
3369  for( int i = -1; i <= 1; i++ ) {
3370  for( int k = -1; k <= 1; k++ ) {
3371  if( destination.x + i > -max_salt_water_pipe_distance &&
3372  destination.x + i < max_salt_water_pipe_distance &&
3373  destination.y + k > -max_salt_water_pipe_distance &&

3379  destination.x][max_salt_water_pipe_distance + destination.y] ) {
3380  if( path_found ) {
3381  if( path_map [max_salt_water_pipe_distance + candidate.x][max_salt_water_pipe_distance +
3382  candidate.y] >
3383  path_map[max_salt_water_pipe_distance + destination.x + i][max_salt_water_pipe_distance +
3384  destination.y + k] ) {
3385  candidate = destination + point( i, k );
3386  }
3387  } else {
3388  candidate = destination + point( i, k );
3389  path_found = true;
3390  }
3391  }
3392  }
3393  }
3394  }
3395  destination = candidate;
3396  }
3397 
3398  pipe->segments.push_back( { tripoint_abs_omt( omt_pos.x() + dir.x + connection_dir.x, omt_pos.y() + dir.y + connection_dir.y, omt_pos.z() ), false, false } );
3399  }
3400 
3401  if( common_salt_water_pipe_construction( miss_id, pipe, 0 ) ) {
3402  if( pipe_is_new ) {
3403  pipe->segments[0].started = true;
3404  salt_water_pipes.push_back( pipe );
3405 
3406  // Provide "salt_water_pipe_*_scheduled" for all the segments needed.
3407  // The guts of basecamp::update_provides modified to feed it generated tokens rather than
3408  // those actually in the recipe, as the tokens needed can't be determined by the recipe.
3409  // Shouldn't need to check that the tokens don't exist previously, so could just set them to 1.
3410  auto e = expansions.find( dir );
3411  for( size_t i = 1; i < pipe->segments.size(); i++ ) {
3412  std::string token = salt_water_pipe_string_base;
3413  token += std::to_string( i );
3414  token += salt_water_pipe_string_suffix;
3415  if( e->second.provides.find( token ) == e->second.provides.end() ) {
3416  e->second.provides[token] = 0;
3417  }
3418  e->second.provides[token]++;
3419  }
3420  }
3421  } else if( pipe_is_new ) {
3422  delete pipe;
3423  }
3424 }

2681  }

4474  const std::unordered_set<ter_str_id> match_terrains = { ter_t_clay, ter_t_dirt, ter_t_dirtmound, ter_t_grass, ter_t_grass_dead, ter_t_grass_golf, ter_t_grass_long, ter_t_grass_tall, ter_t_moss, ter_t_sand };

4477  mismatch_tiles++;

647  std::list<item> ret;

649  return ret;

652  if( bcp_r.fake_id == fake_id ) {
